name: 25:00 (Ruben DeClot)
description:
(♡ ‿ ♡): are you awake? Some say that the best way to know if you are in a dream is to look at the clock to see if the time changes. 

(★ ω ★): whatever that means.

(◕‿◕) ♡: Visit the world of sleep paralysis through the musical and visual sensations that you will find on this tour.

(✯◡✯):  look for the clock and don't fall into a dream

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FOR WINDOWS USERS: I recommend the downloadable version, it runs better. 

Music,  visuals and programming by Ruben DeClot.

OST/BSO: https://open.spotify.com/album/2hiBPlioUQfOn90OZpCfaL?si=LxvrFqQjQB6Qr1CqpNbbLg
